short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and collect leads from professional social profiles. Fill your funnel with quality B2B email contacts and boost sales.
short.es: Encuentra clientes potenciales y recopila perfiles de prospectos en LinkedIn. Llena tu embudo con contactos de email B2B de calidad…
short.pt_BR: Encontre leads e colete perfis de clientes potenciais no Linkedin. Preencha seu funil com contatos de e-mails B2B de qualidade e…
short.uk: Збирайте ліди та їхні профілі на сторінках LinkedIn. Заповніть воронку перевіреними контактами B2B-лідів та ростіть продажі.
short.zh_CN: 在领英上搜索并收集高质量外贸客户线索。填充您的外贸客户数据库，获得高质量客户联系方式，提升销售额。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Сollect verified emails of decision makers right from their professional social profiles with LI Prospect Finder extension.

Set it up in one click and you are good to go – ready to get the email addresses of the most high-paying prospects.

Where can you collect leads with LI Prospect Finder?
Save email addresses from profiles, search pages and attendee lists on professional social networks.

What profile information will you have?
Here’s what data about a potential lead you will collect with LI Prospect Finder: 
First name
Last name
Full name
Prospect’s social profile
Job position
Locality
Company name
Company URL
Company’s social profile
Company size
Company’s locality
Country
State
City
Industry

How can you save leads to your sales pipeline?
When you see a contact you’d like to get, open the LI Prospect Finder plugin in your browser and save the email address and other profile information straight into a chosen list. 

What do you get with LI Prospect Finder?
✓ Spare countless hours by saving full prospect information from profile, search pages and attendee lists one-by-one or in bulk.

✓ Build lead databases with verified and up-to-date email addresses.

✓ Manage leads in a built-in sales CRM or export the leads to your favorite CRMs, like Hubspot or Pipedrive, in a heartbeat.


Before using our LI Prospect Finder, be sure to read and agree to Privacy Policy https://li-prospect-finder.com/privacy-policy

LI Prospect Finder permissions
1."tabs" — is using the chrome.tabs API (getting bookmark links, creating new tabs with our link, reloading open pages of li-prospect-finder.com)
2."http://*/" — access to all sites to get page content (alternative to all_urls)
3."https://*/" — access to all sites to get page content (alternative to all_urls)
4."cookies" — session recovery via cookies from li-prospect-finder.com
5."notifications" — to show push notifications (completion of background tasks)
6."webRequest" — for automated information collection from web pages without direct opening of the pages by the user
7."contextMenus" — to create a new item 'Background tasks' in the context menu of the extension

Sign up right now for a free plan and get 50 credits every month!

We hope you will enjoy the app and would like to encourage you to express your thoughts and let us know about any issues via the website chat window or at help@lipf.store. 

A bigger prospecting lead list today means more business opportunities tomorrow.

Hope to see you onboard 💜
